DocAttribute.Name: ShapeOfProduct
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The IfcProductDefinitionShape shall be used to provide a representation for a single instance of IfcProduct.
IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.

DocAttribute.Name: HasShapeAspects
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the shape aspect that represents part of the shape or its feature distinctively.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Only representations of type IfcShapeModel, i.e. either IfcShapeRepresentation or IfcTopologyRepresentation should be used to represent a product through the IfcProductDefinitionShape.
